description: Changes one or more values for a Dev Environment. Updating certain values of the Dev Environment will cause a restart.

parameters.name: projectName
parameters.description: The name of the project in the space.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The system-generated unique ID of the Dev Environment.

parameters.name: ides
parameters.description: Information about the integrated development environment (IDE) configured for a Dev Environment. (dict) --- Information about the configuration of an integrated development environment (IDE) for a Dev Environment. runtime (string) --- A link to the IDE runtime image. name (string) --- The name of the IDE. Valid values include Cloud9, IntelliJ, PyCharm, GoLand, and VSCode.

nested_params.name: runtime
nested_params.description: A link to the IDE runtime image.

nested_params.name: name
nested_params.description: The name of the IDE. Valid values include Cloud9, IntelliJ, PyCharm, GoLand, and VSCode.

parameters.name: instanceType
parameters.description: The Amazon EC2 instace type to use for the Dev Environment.

parameters.name: inactivityTimeoutMinutes
parameters.description: The amount of time the Dev Environment will run without any activity detected before stopping, in minutes. Only whole integers are allowed. Dev Environments consume compute minutes when running.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The system-generated unique ID of the Dev Environment.

nested_items.name: projectName
nested_items.description: The name of the project in the space.

nested_items.name: alias
nested_items.description: The user-specified alias for the Dev Environment.

nested_items.name: ides
nested_items.description: Information about the integrated development environment (IDE) configured for the Dev Environment.

nested_items.name: runtime
nested_items.description: A link to the IDE runtime image.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the IDE. Valid values include Cloud9, IntelliJ, PyCharm, GoLand, and VSCode.

nested_items.name: instanceType
nested_items.description: The Amazon EC2 instace type to use for the Dev Environment.

nested_items.name: inactivityTimeoutMinutes
nested_items.description: The amount of time the Dev Environment will run without any activity detected before stopping, in minutes.

nested_items.name: clientToken
nested_items.description: A user-specified idempotency token. Idempotency ensures that an API request completes only once. With an idempotent request, if the original request completes successfully, the subsequent retries return the result from the original successful request and have no additional effect.
